item.title: Conda Environments
item.author: amancioandre@gmail.com (andré.amnc)
item.description: No more tears! If you are a user of conda packages, more precisely Jupyter Notebook, as I am, you should worry - a lot! - with your programming environment and your OS. Your environment is one of the barriers that prevent you from cloging your system with all sorts of packages and their - conflicting - versions. Lets be honest, you don’t want a crucial package being overwritten on your system do you?
